What a wonderful goal!
Applying Violence-Free Communication (VFC) to your daily life can have a profound impact on your relationships, :heart: and overall well-being.

Violence-Free Communication (VFC) is an approach developed by Marshall Rosenberg that focuses on empathy, it active listening, effective expression of feelings and needs, to create a more compassionate and respectful communication style.
